org.archive.io.arc
Class ARC2WCDX

java.lang.Object
  org.archive.io.arc.ARC2WCDX

public class ARC2WCDX
extends java.lang.Object

Create a 'Wide' CDX from an ARC. Takes one argument, the path to the ARC. Writes .wcdx.gz in same directory.

Author:
gojomo
